arts.ttl: Augsburg vs. Mainz preview: Which club can turn their momentum around?
arts.sum: Augsburg host Mainz this Saturday in what promises to be a bit of an early-season scrap at the WWK Arena. Which club can turn their momentum around?

arts.ttl: Augsburg vs Mainz - prediction, team news, lineups
arts.sum: Sports Mole previews Saturday's Bundesliga clash between Augsburg and Mainz 05, including predictions, team news and possible lineups.
